(Simplified: 镐)
Pictophonetic: 高 indicates the sound; 釒 (metal) conveys the meaning.
  • Chinese Definition:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 高 [ gāo ] tall, lofty; high, elevated
①刨土的工具。
鎬頭 [ gǎo tou ]: pickaxe
鎬把 [ gǎo bǎ ]: pickaxe handle
鎬京 [ hào jīng ]: Haojing (in modern Shaanxi, northwest of Chang'an county), capital of Western Zhou from c. 1050 BC
(Simplified: 镐)
Pictophonetic: 高 indicates the sound; 釒 (metal) conveys the meaning.
  • Chinese Definition:
Hanzi: 镐

Related Character(s): 金, 高, 茻, 蒿
Связанные символы: золото, высокий, шелковица, полынь

Main pronunciation 主要发音: gǎo

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning stove.

English senses 英语理解: stove; bright

Usage example 用法举例: 鎬頭 gǎo tóu (pick)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 3340

Shuowen 说文解字: 溫器也從金高聲武王所都在長安西上林苑中字亦如此

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 鎬 from metal-bell (钅)釒 jīn and phonetic building-tall 高 gāo simp 镐.

鎬字的基本解释

鎬
gǎo

鎬
hào
均见“镐”。

鎬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hào］
［《廣韻》胡老切，上晧，匣。］
“镐1”的繁体字。
(1)镐京。
(2)古代北方地名。
(3)水名。在今陕西省境。
(4)通“皓”。光明貌。参见“鎬鎬”。
[②]［gǎo］
“镐2”的繁体字。
镐头。

鎬字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鎬； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1318第12
【唐韻】乎老切【集韻】下老切，?音晧。【說文】溫器也。　又【說文】地名。武王所都，在長安西上林苑中。【詩·大雅】鎬京辟雍。【傳】武王作邑於鎬京。【書·洪範傳】以箕子歸鎬京。【釋文】鎬，胡老反。本又作鄗。　又【正字通】靈夏等地，亦曰鎬。【詩·小雅】侵鎬及方。【箋】鎬、方，皆北方地名。【又】來歸自鎬，我行永久。【劉向疏】吉甫之歸，周厚賜之，其詩曰：來歸自鎬，鎬去京師千里，王肅以鎬爲鎬京，王基非之。　又【何晏·景福殿賦】故其華表，則鎬鎬鑠鑠。【註】皆謂光顯昭明也。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hào］
["Guangyun" Hu Laoqie, Shang Hao, Xia. ]
The traditional characters for "鈥1".
(1) Ho Kyung.
(2) The names of ancient northern places.
(3) Water name. In today's Shaanxi Province.
(4) Through "Hao". Bright looks. See "Pick Pick".
[②]［gǎo］
The traditional characters of "Hook 2".
Pickaxe.
pick

The capital of King Wu is in the Xishang Forest Garden in Chang'an. 【Poetry·Daya】Ho Jing Pi Yong. [Biography] Wu Wang Zuo Yi Yu Hao Jing. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Invade the ho and square. 【Jian】Ho and Fang are the names of northern places. [Also] Come back from Hao, I will go forever.
